articles.title: Supreme Court Seems Ready to Reject Efforts to Kick Trump Off the Ballot
articles.description: During oral arguments, justices from both ideological wings expressed deep skepticism about Colorado's decision to disqualify Trump under the 14th Amendment's insurrection clause.

articles.title: Microsoft's Copilot app is now available on iOS and Android
articles.description: Microsoft has released its AI-powered Copilot app for iOS and Android devices, offering users access to GPT-4 and DALL-E 3 capabilities for free, marking a significant expansion of its AI tools to mobile platforms.

articles.title: King Charles III diagnosed with cancer, Buckingham Palace says
articles.description: The palace announced that King Charles III has been diagnosed with cancer discovered during his recent prostate treatment. He has begun regular treatments and postponed public duties while continuing state business.
